pageContext.geocode_address: 180 Camino Alto, Mill Valley, CA 94941, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: In this full day summer camp, kids experience a half day of playful exercising with Play-Well Move to complement a half day of LEGO® building with Play-Well TEKnologies. In the morning, dive into the LEGO® Mindstorms EV3 system to build and program the machine of your dreams. Later in the day, get active with the Play-Well Move sports program. Learn new skills while working as a team in a variety of activities such as frisbee, kickball, and group communication games. Exercising your body and mind has never been more fun!
pageContext.course_type_name: Robotics with LEGO® EV3 System + Play-Well Move: FULL DAY
